projects.title: DevFlow - Developer Workflow Platform
projects.description: A productivity tool for developers to manage tasks, write notes, and organize workflows using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: SnapNotes - Note Taking App
projects.description: Offline-capable note taking PWA built with Next.js and MongoDB. Includes Markdown support, search, and tags.

products.name: PocketPOS
products.description: A mobile-first Point of Sale system built in Flutter with support for printing, offline sync, and multi-store support. Backend in Node.js and MySQL.

products.name: InstaCache - Redis Admin Tool
products.description: A lightweight Redis GUI admin tool for developers. Visualizes keys, TTL, and memory usage. Built with Electron + React.
